QuestData.Title: The Recovery of Tyrande Whisperwind
QuestData.Description:
The Night Warrior's power is tearing Tyrande apart. Such rage... it is consuming her.
<Shandris is silent a moment.>
And yet, my mother speaks true. We cannot leave the souls of my people to suffer.
We shall follow Tyrande into Torghast. We must find a way to save the spirits of the kaldorei.
And in the process, pray that we can save my minn'do as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Torghast to recover Tyrande Whisperwind.
QuestData.RewardText:
I cannot fault my mother's intent... but she will be consumed before she finds justice for our people.
We must find another way to bring her back.
